text: {| |} Connewango was authorized as YT-388, but reclassified YTB-388 on 15 May 1944 prior to launching by the Consolidated Shipbuilding Corporation, Morris Heights, New York, on 29 July of that year. Completed in November, she was assigned to the 3rd Naval District where she performed patrol and towing duties. In 1946 she was transferred to the 6th Naval District where she continued until being struck in 1986. ==References== * * NavSource Online: Service Ship Photo Archive Connewango (YTM-388) Category:Sassaba-class tugs Category:Ships built in Morris Heights, Bronx Category:1944 ships Category:World War II auxiliary ships of the United States
title: USS Connewango (YTM-388)
